name: Products
description: Also known as micro-pigmentation or permanent makeup, semi-permanent cosmetics is a procedure of implanting coloured pigment into the dermal layer of the skin to create lasting cosmetic effects. It can be used for camouflaging imperfections such as discoloration or scarring, or simply to escape the daily application required with traditional makeup routines by mimicking the appearance of real makeup.

options.name: Avanti
options.description: Avanti professional blowdryers provide a fast, sleek and powerful blowdry that minimize both drying time and hair damage caused by heat. With a sleek, lightweight design and ergonomic handle, the Avanti blowdryer is ideal for travelling.

options.name: B. Vain Cosmetics
options.description: B.Vain is a mineral based cosmetics line that covers all your makeup needs. From 100% crushed mineral foundation to vibrant eyeshadow palettes, B.Vain is designed to both nourish your skin and leave you looking glamorous.

options.name: Big Sexy Hair
options.description: Lakme products offer a range of styling options. From conditioning sprays to texturizing gels, Lakme gives you the products necessary to have fun with your hair while maintaining a sleek and stylish look.

options.name: Davines
options.description: Davines has a range of products to suit each of your hair, face and body needs. Inspired by nature, Davines uses all natural ingredients and authentic formulas, leaving your skin and hair feeling completely revived. This essential hair care uses bottles with 25% less plastic and reusable containers.

name: Services
description: The Rush Salon has enough services to serve you and your family. Check them out below.
